25 Greatest Celebrity Guests counts down the greatest celebrity guests from both the E! and Howard Stern TV show archives. Hosted by comedian Jim Breuer , this special features A-list celebrities who entered Howard Stern 's lair and weren't afraid to let it all hang out during their interviews with The Larry King of All Media. Featured celebrities include The Osbournes, Anna Nicole Smith , Arnold Schwarzenegger , David Letterman , Pam Anderson, Courtney Love and Chevy Chase , amongst many, many others.
